ValidationRule.description: Forces Automated to be the Audio Type when the Audio Provider is L3 and the Event Type is Auto.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "Level 3"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Auto"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Automated")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Auto L3 events can only have an Audio Type of Automated. Please update and try saving again.
